title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your first website.

title: Advanced Python Programming
description: Deep dive into Python's advanced features including generators, decorators, and asynchronous programming.

title: Machine Learning with Python
description: Hands-on course covering supervised and unsupervised ML techniques using Python and scikit-learn.

title: Frontend Development with React
description: Build modern web interfaces with React, including hooks and component design.

title: AI for Everyone
description: An introductory course to AI concepts, tools, and real-world applications. No coding required.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms in Java
description: Master recursion, sorting, searching, and optimization techniques using Java.

title: Building REST APIs with Node.js
description: Learn Express, routing, middleware, and database connections to build robust backend APIs.

title: Deep Learning Fundamentals
description: Train neural networks using TensorFlow and Keras, covering CNNs, RNNs, and LSTMs.

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Understand digital threats, encryption, firewalls, and safe practices in Hindi for new learners.

title: Designing Dashboards with JavaScript
description: Create interactive dashboards with charting libraries, DOM manipulation, and UI best practices.
